data.message: The merchandise is definitely not worth the money stop tryna bleed the fans dry with crap clothing I've bought a few of these bundles a rap god tee n you can't even see the lyrics properly pile of shite whoever gets the stuff made needs to give their heads a wobble

replies.message:
The hat is legit and the regular version sells for the same price at Comerica Park for Tigers games. I picked one up at the show.

The same can't be said for the jersey but it's a nice piece for people who are big fans (I didn't buy it).

Fair comment Andrew I live in UK so had to pay big postage fees n was bitterly disappointed at the quality of the rap god tee I bought that's all I was sayin like on the pic you could make out every lyric when it came it literally just looked like a black t shirt

This is what I'm saying not fair on the fans it's probs not ems fault he is being told what to market by other people n they use the shittest cheapest material n stamp a backwards E on it , shit sells

New era are the daddy of baseball caps so you can't complain about that. $40 (£25) is the going rate for a new era hat here in good old rainy England so I haven't got any complaints not even the postage cost.
The jersey and hat was  made with major-league baseball and Has sewn patches and the lettering and numbering is sewn
I have the jersey - it's the same quality as all my other Detroit tigers jerseys as it is an OFFICIAL MLB jersey.
guys add me we are having maximum EMinem stuff :)
